details.floor: Uneven Flagstone (difficult to run) (dense rubble (move at half speed))
details.illumination: Shadowy (phosphorescent fungus or candles every 20 ft.)

hidden_treasure: Hidden Locked Good Wooden Chest (good lock)
detail.room_features: A magical pool in the north-west corner of the room summons a water elemental to serve whomever drinks from it (but only once), and a tile mosaic of geometric patterns covers the floor

north.desc: Trapped and Stuck Strong Wooden Door

detail.room_features: A sloped pit lined with iron spikes lies in the south-east corner of the room, and the north and west walls are covered with slime

south.desc: Trapped and Locked Iron Door (good lock)

detail.room_features: Burning torches in iron sconces line the north and east walls, and someone has scrawled "Sharpen thy blade and ready thy shield" in blood on the west wall
A stone stair ascends towards the south wall, and a warped door lies in the south-east corner of the room

hidden_treasure: Hidden Trapped and Locked Simple Wooden Chest (superior lock)
detail.room_features: A well lies in the north-west corner of the room, and a corroded iron key hangs from a hook on the south and west walls

east.desc: Trapped and Unlocked Strong Wooden Door

detail.room_features: Several iron cages are scattered throughout the room, and an unidentifiable odor fills the room

west.desc: Trapped and Stuck Good Wooden Door

detail.room_features: Spirals of white stones cover the floor, and someone has scrawled "The Company of the Crimson Bear looted this place" on the west wall
A magical altar of a goddess of death in the south-east corner of the room causes all attacks within 30 feet to deal double damage, and a forge and anvil sit in the center of the room
Skeletons hang from chains and manacles against the east and west walls, and a briny odor fills the west side of the room
A stair ascends to a wooden platform in the south side of the room, and several pieces of rotten leather are scattered throughout the room
A wooden platform hangs over a deep pit in the south side of the room, and a tile mosaic of arcane patterns covers the floor

detail.room_features: Someone has scrawled "Mind the gap" on the south wall, and numerous monstrous skulls lie within niches in the south and east walls

settings.name: The Prison of the Gargoyle Princess

wandering_monsters.1: 1 x 1st Level Warrior Drow Elf, consumed by disease and madness
